name: Mr. Pencil: The Lost Colors of Doodleburg!
Kari: Stranded on the Shores of Vanaheim
Banana Slug Beach
description: Banana Slug Beach is an open world voxel game where everything can be sculpted, even players. Your world evolves over time, reacting to player & bot actions. Play alone, or with friends-- build a world together and try to prevent its collapse!

name: Contact Spotted
description: Contact Spotted is a tactical 5 vs 5 first-person shooter where you will have to rely on your teammates to complete your task. You will be deployed on a map as a law-enforcement officer or a terrorist and engage in different gamemodes, everything from bomb defusal to zone defending.

name: Beyond Hope
description: Beyond Hope gives you and your friends one epic space journey! Your mission alone or with friends is to save yourself from getting pulled into the hot Sun. Gather debris, scavenge asteroids and build your own space station. Reach for the stars and survive when all odds are against you!

name: I Don't Want to Die
description:
The game is simple: You play as Mr Nife Frown who is grumpy but doesn't want to die. But than things randomly start falling from the sky and if they hit you, you die.

It is as simple as that

This was made for 2 hour challenge by the talented devs at Stux Games.

name: Aria: Dragon Eater
description: "Aria: Dragon Eater" is a fantasy action top-down shooter game set in a magical era. Begin your journey to unravel the mystery surrounding the death of the dragon!

name: Really Bad Flying Machine
description: This is a puzzle game where you play as a flying machine. Shoot your propellers off to break boxes. Once you shoot a propeller, you lose the ability to move to its direction. Collect keys to advance through the floors.

name: Relics of Deldroneye 1.5: Return to Zantis
The Adventures of Boxman
description: The Adventures of Boxman features a turn-based combat system and three distinct areas to explore as you progress through your adventure.

name: The Ultimate Strategy Game Collection I
description:
A compilation with these three strategy games from Paradox Entertainment:

Chariots of War
Europa Universalis
Hearts of Iron

name: Bonk's Adventure / Bonk's Revenge / Gates of Thunder
Sofia the First: Sofia's New Friends
description: Get active and train for the Tri-Kingdom Picnic Games with Sofia and James. Jump into action, race, hop, fly, sled and put your best foot forward!

name: Petscop
description: Petscop is a fictional game featured in the YouTube web series of the same name. Presented as a "lost" and unfinished PS1 puzzle game from a company named Garalina, it is eventually revealed to have disturbing and personal ties to the series's narrator, Paul. There was speculation about whether or not Petscop was an actual game that was programmed, and whether or not such a game would be made available to fans after the end of the series. Ultimately, it was revealed that the world of Petscop was created via animation.

name: Externus: Path of the Solari
description: Externus: Path of the Solari is a character-driven tactical roleplaying game (RPG) adapted from an original tabletop game. The game features turn-based tactical combat, full 3D battlefields, character-driven story, choose your own adventure sequences, permadeath that changes the story, and more.

name: The Law Man: Secure the Law
Rot in a Porcelain Dream
description: Rot is a 2.5D tag-team action adventure that combines exploration and fighting game mechanics. Explore a dying, dark fantasy world warped by powerful personas known as beacons. Fight, survive, save your home, and watch as the world around is changed as the powers of the beacons strengthen or weaken.

name: Learn to Write with Mr. Pencil
Do Not Buy This Game
description: Are you really reading this to find out more? ...FINE! If you DO buy this game, expect me to narrate in your ear for around 2 hours about your poor life choices, all while I'll try to create something resembling a game for you to walk around in.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2021
description: Draft Day Sports: College Basketball 2021 puts you in the role of head coach of your favorite college basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from staff hiring, recruiting, scouting and all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to tournament glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: PitRush
description:
About the game: PitRush 
Pitrush is a couch coop arena combat game. 
 
You slip into the role of a powerful gladiator in a dystopian asian cyberpunk world. 
Join the fight with up to 3 more friends to fight for glory and fame and slash evil robots. 
 
Life in the pits is tough. The audience decides whether you will rise or fall. 
Entertain the masses with skillful moves, and they might reward you.

name: Aya
description:
Developed by 500 Miles Studio, Aya is a graphic adventure where we will control the forensic investigator who gives the game its name. Starting from her immediate present, in which our protagonist suffers an end-stage Alzheimer, we will travel back eighteen years to Havenmist, her hometown, a small mountain-town, where as players, we must solve the so-called Iscariot case. Howeder, our adventure will take us along the Ashmore state, while we sneak into the lives of dozens of characters, whose secrets lie under that isolated place of eternal snows.

Throughout the investigation, we will perfom autopsies to obtain evidences, we will process crime scenes in search of clues, we will analyse the muerderer´s rituality with which commits his acts, we will investigate the background of the different victims to discover why they were chosen, we will interrogate to possible suspects to wrench them a confession or to hear their testimony, we will raise hypotheses based on the proofs collected, and finally, we will reveal the motivations of its author and the meaning of his "work".

name: My Kingdom For the Princess
description: Original Time-management & Strategy Game Protect the Princess and restore the Kingdom in in this addictive Tycoon-strategy game!

name: My Little Pony: Fighting is Magic
description: My Little Pony: Fighting is Magic was an upcoming fan-made fighting game inspired by the animated television series My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. It was under development by a team of nine volunteers who call themselves Mane6. Being of a fan-made nature, this game was neither licensed nor endorsed by Hasbro.

name: TouchFish
description: Nurture, Build, Play & Share in a build-your-own-world social experience like no other.

name: Ride the Comix
description: Players wear an HMD to "enter the comic book world." Players battle with super villains by using a laser sword. Up to six players can be on a team at a time.

name: Star Wars: Project Stardust
description: Destroy the Death Star in a VR remake of a 1983 Atari classic arcade game. Pilot an X-Wing as you destroy TIE fighters, Turbolaser turrets, and avoid Darth Vader while making an attack run. Created at the University of Utah by Dylan Stout as a research project on Virtual Reality Sickness.

name: Himig
description: Himig is a cozy game about experiencing the calm, everyday moments of life, making memories and finding joy from little, mundane things, and letting those serve as an inspiration to shape the future ahead of you.

name: Old Friends Dog Sanctuary
description: Welcome to Old Friends Dog Sanctuary, where love never grows old! A game about friendship for people who love dogs.

name: Creature Resort
description: Creature Resort is a resort management game where your guests are creatures from all over a colorful and mysterious fantasy world.

name: Nora to Oujo to Noraneko Heart 2: Dakimakura Cover Set
Tohoku Daigaku Karei Igaku Kenkyuusho: Kawashima Ryuuta Kyouju Kanshuu - Mono Sugoku Nou wo Kitaeru 5-Funkan no Oni Training
Brigandine: The Legend of Runersia - Limited Edition
LoveR Kiss: Costume Deluxe Pack
description: The “R” in LoveR stands for “Romance” and “Record.” Players will develop their love with six girl characters designed by Taro Mino and take pictures of their memories. In addition to the six charming girls, the chemistry teacher Himari Saiki has been added as a romantic interest. The theme of her route is "experiments in love".

name: Senran Kagura: Peach and Reflexions Limited Double Pack
Atelier: Alchemists of the Dusk Trilogy DX - Premium Box
Phantasy Star Online 2: Episode 6 - Deluxe Package
Bandai Namco Games Presents: J Legend Retsuden
Shin Megami Tensei: Deep Strange Journey - 25th Anniversary Special Box
Sumikko Gurashi: Koko ga Ochitsukun Desu
Pokémon Ultra Sun Ultra Moon Double Pack
Shape Boxing 2: Wii de Enjoy Diet!
Choujikuu Yousai Macross: Ai Oboete Imasu Ka Hybrid Pack - 30th Anniversary Box
Hakuouki Shinkai Ginsei no Shou Genteiban
Katou Hifumi Kudan Kanshuu Hifumin No Shogi Dojo
Undertale: Disbelief
description:
This is a fangame of Undertale by Toby Fox. It is based on a fanmade Undertale animation. 
This game is an expanded version of what is seen in the animation. 
All the attack designs and dialogue lines have been heavily improved, and there are more endings and much more to explore than what is seen in the animation.

name: Die Hard 64
description: Die Hard 64 is a cancelled game for the Nintendo 64 developed by Bits Studios.

name: Toon Panic
description: Toon Panic was a multiplayer brawler / arcade fighting game for Nintendo 64, in development at Bottom Up. It was meant to be similar to Power Stone or Rakugaki ShowTime, but it was later cancelled because of bankruptcy of the studio.

name: Toraware no Palm: Refrain - Deluxe Edition
Harukanaru Toki no Naka De 7: Ransei no Sadame wo Koeru Box
Hakuouki Shinkai: Ginsei no Shou Twin Pack
THE Variety Game Daishugo: Kingyo Sukui, Card, Suji Puzzle, Nikakudori
Kishi Fujii Souta no Shogi Training
description: Kishi Fujii Souta no Shogi Training is a shogi training game that supervised by a professional shogi player Souta Fujii. Beginners will find a lighthearted and enjoyable opportunity to learn the basics of shogi. Experience the fun and depth of shogi with Souta Fujii as your guide.

name: Amnesia for Nintendo Switch
description: Port of Amnesia for the Nintendo Switch.

description:
This edition includes the following
Game: Atelier Ayesha: The Alchemist of Dusk DX,

name: Shiawase Shou no Kanrinin-san
description: Somewhere in Japan lies the suburban Hanasaki City. It’s a city that capitalizes on its abundance of water resources and diligent townspeople to prosper in the precision equipment and factory plant cultivation industries. The setting of Happy Manager is an apartment building built on the high ground in Hanasaki City called “Happy Manor.”

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! Kibou no Meikyuu to Tsudoishi Boukensha-tachi Plus: Complete Edition
Shiroki Koutetsu no X: The Out of Gunvolt
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou: EG The Best
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou includes the 19 scenarios of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Sui, plus three additional scenarios making their console debut (Outbreak, Outbreak Kamikanshi-hen, and Hinamizawa Teiryuujo). It will also feature a new opening song and movie, 1080p resolution support in TV mode, and "Quiz Oyashiro Ver. 2018" (Higurashi series quiz mode).

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Iki
New Gundam Breaker: Build G Sound Edition
description: Break, build and battle with the Gunpla you’ve always wanted in NEW GUNDAM BREAKER! Blast through enemy Gunplas and collect their fallen weapons and armor to customize your Gunpla in real time and now you can team up with your friends in a 3v3 co-op mode! Don’t miss out on the action in the newest installment of this fan-favorite series!​

description:

description: Let the survival of the fittest Rider Battle commence! Witness the Rider’s individuality go against another’s characteristics through the renewed action fighting game.

name: Sengoku Basara 4: Sumeragi - Anniversary Edition
description: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Sengoku Basara 4: Sumeragi (Sengoku Basara 4 Sumeragi + 56 pieces of downloadable content on disc), Special Illustrated Box, Download Code for Weapon Item, Special booklet "Sengoku Heroes 15th Anniversary Art Book"

name: Déraciné: Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:

- Luxury Package

name: Call of Duty: WWII - Game of the Year Edition
description: Call of Duty returns to its roots with Call of Duty: WWII - a breathtaking experience that redefines World War II for a new gaming generation. Land in Normandy on D-Day and battle across Europe through iconic locations in history’s most monumental war. Experience classic Call of Duty combat, the bonds of camaraderie, and the unforgiving nature of war against a global power throwing the world into tyranny.

name: Watch Dogs + Watch Dogs 2 Double Pack
description: Purchase the Watch Dogs and Watch Dogs 2 bundle and gain access to these award-winning titles at a great price. In Watch Dogs, become Aiden Pearce and hack your way around Chicago to take down ctOS. In Watch Dogs 2, join Marcus Holloway and the Dedsec hacker group to expose a new digital conspiracy.

name: Gundam Versus: Premium G Sound Edition
Ys IX: Monstrum Nox - Collector's Box

name: Kamen Rider: Battride War Genesis - Memorial TV Sound Edition
description: The newest addition to the Kamen Rider series of videogames is about to launch with a frenzy; new features have made this action brawler extremely explosive, especially with a solid nod to all the loyal fans, new and old, who have followed the heroic exploits of Japan's dramatically posing transforming superheroes!

description: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme VS. MaxiBoost ON [Premium Sound Edition], HG 1/144 Extreme Gundam & Eclipse F Parts (EX VS. 10th Anniversary Color Ver.) Gunpla figure

description: This edition includes the following PS4 Game: Sword Art Online Lost Song, DLC Game: Sword Art Online Re: Hollow Fragment (Code Only)

description:
This edition includes the following

Tales of Vesperia: The First Strike Blu-ray disc

name: Aikagi Kimi to Issho ni Pack: Premium Edition
Super Robot Wars V: Premium Anime Song & Sound Edition
ARK Park: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition will provide players with additional outfits and an "exclusive dinosaur mount". You can get "Hunter Avatar Set" and "Tyrannosaurus" in ARK series. In addition to PS Plus subscribers, "Military Avatar Set" comes with the deluxe edition as well so you can enjoy more adventure!

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme vs. Maxi Boost ON - Premium Sound Edition
description: Set in the globally iconic Gundam universe, Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme VS. Maxiboost ON enables players to take two-on-two player-versus-player combat to the next level with Mobile Suits spanning the entire breadth of the franchise’s history. In total, Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme VS. Maxiboost ON features 183 playable units from 36 different Gundam iterations, each with unique abilities designed to match any fan’s personal playstyle. Players can choose between three different EX Burst Systems—Fighting Burst, Extend Burst and Shooting Burst—to coordinate with allies and lay waste to all that stands—or fly—in their way. Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme VS. Maxiboost ON offers one-to-four player online co-op and player-versus-player play.

name: THE Taikan! Sports Pack: Tennis, Bowling, Golf, Billiard
Metal Max Xeno: Reborn - Limited Edition
description: This edition includes the following: Metal Max Xeno: Reborn, Special Illustrated Box, Downloadable Content "Old Friend R", Special Booklet "ReBorn to be Wild", Special Mega-size Pins x 3, Special Soundtrack

name: Ninja Simulator
description: Ninja Simulator is an action-adventure stealth game, which takes place in feudal Japan. You will play as a mercenary hired for missions of infiltration, espionage, and elimination. Your actions will strengthen or overthrow rival clans and change the course of history.

name: Oddinary Highway
description:
Oddinary Highway is a retrofuturistic shoot’em up with roguelite elements and ever-changing game mechanics. Set out on a dangerous journey through the hyperspace known as the “Oddinary Highway” to face Boss and his robo-mafia.

Oddinary Highway is full of the Weirdonium matter, which leaks to the reality through the breaches left by the hyperspace travelers. Every level comes with a new random weirdonium leak which affects the gameplay in a major way, keep an eye on it!

But are you ready to overcome this journey and face Boss? Sure you are! After all Caddy Luck has plenty of guns and items to help Bill in the fight with the various habitants of crazy worlds.

name: Doodle
description:
Doodle is a free multiplayer game of disastrous doodles and ridiculous guesses.

- Each player starts by selecting a phrase or word for the game.
- This phrase is then passed to next player who draws what they've been given.
- This drawing is the passed to the next player who has to guess what the drawing is.

This cycle of doodling and guessing continues until every phrase has gone round the whole group - at which point the game ends and you can all see the results and where things went hilariously wrong.

name: Soldier of Fortune: Tactical Low-Violence Version
description: A censored version of Soldier of Fortune that removes all blood and gore from the game.

name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburo: Shinjuku Chuuou Kouen Satsujin Jiken
Stormrite
description: Stormrite is an upcoming open-world Action-RPG set in the dark, fantasy-medieval kingdom of Redreach. You will play the role of a young squire, exploring a world full of chaos and conflict. Become an expert assassin, learn the arts of dark magic, or lead your armies into large-scale war. With multiple endings to all questlines and a rich character tree to decide how you interact with the environment and its inhabitants, you have the power to decide your role in the world of Stormrite.

name: Divided Land
description: Divided Land is a multiplayer RPG game that features realistic survival mechanics and skill-based melee combat in a vast medieval open world

name: Anord
description:
Anord is a single-player 2.5D Sci-fi Action RPG Platformer set in a post-war era. It has horror elements and challenging boss fights only suitable for brave souls. You play as a cyborg, made to infiltrate enemy fronts at any cost. You level up and customize your character's abilities to match your playstyle and defeat stronger enemies and bosses. 
 
 
Left behind in a scientific facility, you wake up to find yourself amid a profound war between Sun's Nation Corporation (SNC) and Rebels fighting for Earth's freedom. As you explore the furthest reaches of Earth and space while encountering various enemies, the character you decide to become will help the Rebels get victorious. You are the unplanned variable in SNC's evasion equations. Break their code!

name: Jupiter Moons: Mecha
description: Choose your mech, customize your loadout, and build your perfect deck. Experiment with cards to find powerful combinations as you enjoy the tactical combat and deckbuilding in this roguelike adventure!

name: Anomaly Hunter
description: In the age of time-travelling machines, that's obvious that somebody will mess up - play as detective, who must fix time anomalies and find the guest of honor. Meet King Arthur, alien mutants and communist dictator - all in a single game. Control time, discover worlds, destroy civilizations just by... CLICKING! Hidden object power!

name: White Mask
description:
White Mask is a text-based horror adventure game about private detective who is looking for a kidnapped child in a phantasmagoric and terrifying worlds.

The game is in development. The final version will include:

* 33% horror, 33% noir detective, 33% absurd, 1% spelling mistakes.

* A pure story without ugly graphics or annoying music.

* Narrative and atmospheric gameplay.

* Branching non-linear dialogues.

* 7 different locations: from the postapocalyptic wasteland to Victorian London.

* Hard moral choices.

* The ending that depends of your in-game decisions.

name: America is Doing Great
description:
A post-apocalyptic role-playing game. Escape enslavement in the barren remnants of Colorado, centuries after the ice caps melt. America is a flooded, war-ravaged shell of its former self... and it's doing GREAT!

Two centuries have passed since we flooded the Earth.

For decades, humans struggled to survive, clustered on the new archipelagos, committing violence over what crude oil and arable land remained. The United States collapsed and was divided among the world's remaining nations.

You are forced by threat of enslavement to flee your home on the coast of Kansas, driven into the devastated, lawless remnants of Colorado. Stranded with no home to return to...

name: Kitori Academy
description: Kitori Academy is a life simulator where you live the adventures of a wizard apprentice with your spirit companion. Train your magical skills and learn how to brew potions, grow vegetables and catch spells to challenge the curse that lurks in the world.

name: Where Birds Go to Sleep
description: Slip into the subconscious of Cormo, a criminal sent on a mission to chart new lands shrouded in a mind-altering fog, never directly assuming control. You will mould him through every sentence you put in his mind… but you might not like what he becomes.

name: Go Long!
description: you're an up and coming athlete on the day of his biggest challenge yet! you only have one minute to gather your thoughts and prepare yourself - you'd better make it count!

name: The Four Old Gods
description: A real-time with pause strategy game prototyped for Enbyjam 2016. Control your units with the mouse, and then press and hold SPACE to move forward in time. Releasing the SPACE bar freezes time, allowing you to change tactics and command your allies while the world is paused.

name: A Host of Gentle Terrors
description:
A Host of Gentle Terrors throws you into a constantly shifting world filled with strange inhabitants. You'll discover monstrosity, isolation, and possibly even connection in this text-based game's often surreal and unsettling fantasy landscape. You might call it a queer procedurally generated open world weird fantasy roguelike walking simulator... but you probably couldn't do it very seriously. 
 
Remember your journey, a journey that will always be uniquely your own... 
 
This Cool Walking Simulator Features: 
No Leveling 
No Crafting System 
Bullets! (but no guns to shoot them with) 
No Stamina Meters 
No Retro Pixel Art 
One Zombie 
Non-Euclidean Geography 
Uncomfortably Biological Machinery 
Abandoned Places 
Loads of Strange Things Animal, Vegetable, and Mineral 
A Fishing Mini Game Everyone Loves Fishing Mini Games Right? 
Tyranny And Mutation (The Concepts, Not The Album) 
Queer Shit I Mean It's A Twine Game What Honestly Did You Expect 
NEW: Autosaving!

name: Anima: Song from the Abyss
description: Song from the Abyss is the new Action RPG set in the world of Gaïa, from the renowned roleplaying book franchise Anima Beyond Fantasy. The game allows you to control two different characters and explore a world full of mysteries. Experience a fluid combat system and a deep story with unforgettable characters.

name: Mega Bowling Dash
description: Mega Bowling Dash is an endless runner and racing game with cool power-ups, fancy cool hats, and fun stages to jump, dodge, and go through.

name: Igeo DX
description: Igeo DX is a Sokoban-style puzzler with mechanically simple but challenging gameplay. Push and combine like-shapes to solve increasingly complex spatial and logic puzzles.

name: Agony of a Dying MMO
description: Agony of a Dying MMO is a narrative horror game that takes place in the final hours of a massively multiplayer online game before its servers shut down for good leaving behind a dedicated, but divided community of players.

name: EvoTown
description:
On a journey to the Evolution of the Red Town, 
a game with a unique story, 
a game with adventure and a tactical game at the same time. 
EvoTown is a game of skill in which two groups compete against each other, the so-called Vulgarian House and the Vuled House.

name: Commando Jack Respawn
description:
A new, more controllable way to play tower defence! A fast paced, shooting & tower defence strategy game in one! There is no other like it.

Commando Jack: Respawn, he is back, brand new & better than ever! You are going to love this game, because it is the 2nd release of the Commando Jack franchise from Colossal Games, with 8+ years passing since the original, we have listened to your feedback & multiplied the best features & hidden strategies of the original into this version, delivering a far greater PC experience, which is much more challenging, fun & functional!

Analyse the battlefield, deploy your weapons, cover the map with remote control turrets, funnel the enemy into view, decimate them up close with impact grenades, rain bullets from the sky with the drone, launch explosive nukes to damage them all, commission surface to air missiles, upgrade your battle technology, use lifesaving boost packs at the most effective moment possible, supercharge Commando Jack with his deadly weapons, get 3 stars, be the best, prove yourself, do it, do it now!

name: The Dark Eye: Book of Heroes - Collector's Edition
The Big Simulation Box 3: Best of Simulations
Die Drei??? Kids: Jagd auf Das Phantom
Battlefield 1: Revolution and Titanfall 2: Ultimate Edition Bundle

Persona Q2: New Cinema Labyrinth - Showtime Premium Edition
The Walking Dead: Game of the Year Edition
The Elder Scrolls Online: Morrowind - Collector's Edition
The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild - Special Edition
Dissidia Final Fantasy NT: Steelbook Brawler Edition
description: In partnership with Team Ninja, Square Enix presents DISSIDIA FINAL FANTASY NT as the next evolution in squad-based brawlers.

name: Dead Cells: Prisoner's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Dead Cells (Action Game of The Year Edition),
- The Bad Seed DLC Code,
- Collector’s Metal Tin,

name: Raiden V: Director's Cut - Limited Edition
description: Raiden V, a vertical shoot 'em up sequel is set to feature multiple stories, as well as the highest number of stages and weapons featured in a single Raiden game thus far. name: Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! Bundle
Walking Simulator A Month Club (Complete Edition)
description:
Nothing gets in the way of the landscape. The player is merely there to witness, and there are no gameplay mechanics to dictate how the world arranges itself. There is no win condition, and no goals other than the ones you make. Set off in any direction for as long or as little as you see fit, taking only your memories with you.

The Walking Simulator A Month Club was an experiment to create and release a vast, explorable landscape with accompanying soundtrack every month that ran from 2015-2020. Between the solo development and the improvisational approach to design, some pretty wild and evocative stuff came out of it. Go forth and wander!

name: Earthlock 2
description: Earthlock 2 will be an open-world action RPG with complex interlocking systems that work together to offer players extensive freedom to customise their own experience.

name: Business Heroes: Street Grub
description:
Business Heroes: Street Grub is a strategic business simulation game that challenges players to build and manage a thriving food truck empire. Set in a bustling urban environment, players must navigate the competitive world of street food by developing unique recipes, managing resources, and adapting to dynamic market conditions. With a focus on entrepreneurship, strategic decision-making, and economic management,

The game offers an engaging experience for players who enjoy balancing risk and reward while scaling their business from a single food cart to a city-wide sensation.

name: Bud Spencer & Terence Hill: Slaps and Beans - Anniversary Edition
Taiko no Tatsujin: Drum 'n' Fun! - Collector's Edition
RollerCoaster Tycoon 9 Mega Pack
description:
Roller-coaster Tycoon: Experience the challenges and pulse-pounding excitement of creating and running the ultimate amusement park. Start with an undeveloped tract of land, a modest bank account and your wildest dreams. Accurate motion dynamics/physics produce thrilling rides - or the ultimate disaster! Excitement/Nausea ratings let you design attractions for guests of all stomach strengths. Track your financial performance and see if you can make a profit in this highly volatile business! 
 
Roller-coaster Tycoon - Added Attractions Pack: Get ready to experience all the excitement behind the design and construction of your very own theme park with this official add-on pack for Roller-coaster Tycoon! Expand the possibilities (and the profits!) of your park by adding more rollercoasters, thrilling ride enhancements and new food and retail shops. Include something for everybody, like a miniature golf course or a ghost train with underground sections - you can even add a suspended monorail! It's your park and you're in complete control! 
 
Roller-coaster Tycoon - Loopy Landscapes Expansion Pack: Loopy Landscapes features all-new attractions, such as new types of roller coasters and rides, including the Jet Ski ride, plus new park shops, such as T-shirt stands, donut stands and a coffee cafe. There are also six new park themes, among them a winter park and an urban park. Thirty new scenarios, including desert, arctic and medieval castle themes, challenge players with unique terrain and new scenario objectives. Several real amusement parks from England have also been included to see if players can handle the real thing! 
 
Roller-coaster Tycoon 2: Build the theme park of your dreams! Now you can create everything you miss in real parks. Combine fantasy with demand and defy the laws of physics. Success has to be earned and you only have the means to make new investments when your guests scream for joy. Test your Tycoon skills with 25 amazing Six Flags coasters and 5 Six Flags parks based in real-life locations. Bigger parks, higher roller coasters and more attractions: Roller-coaster Tycoon 2 offers almost unlimited possibilities. Includes countless theme worlds: Pirate Land, Wild West, Water World and many others plus roller coasters, such as 'Giga Coaster', 'Spinning Wild Mouse' and 'Inverted Impulse Coaster'. 
 
Roller-coaster Tycoon 2 - Time Twister Add-On: The best-selling game that started the "Tycoon" craze ramps up the fun with all-new rides, features and gameplay that make creating and running the ultimate amusement park more fun, more creative and addictive. Break ground and start from scratch, open the gates to existing parks or just create the most gut-wrenching roller coaster ride ever - now you can play your way. As a Roller-coaster Tycoon there are no limits! 
 
Roller-coaster Tycoon 2 - Wacky Worlds Add-On: Climb the Great Wall of China, witness the awesome splendour of the Taj Mahal and have lunch in the shadow of the Eiffel Tower--all in the same day--in the Roller-coaster Tycoon 2: Wacky Worlds expansion pack. Now, you can include the most exotic rides and attractions from around the globe when creating the ultimate virtual amusement park. Roller-coaster Tycoon 2: Wacky Worlds provides you with all-new rides, scenarios and scenery themes from every one of the Earth's continents, even Antarctica. 
 
Roller-coaster Tycoon 3: Get your barf bag ready! Roller-coaster Tycoon 3 takes the series to new heights with brand new features including 3-D graphics, giving players complete control of views around the park, and a front seat to the action with a new Coaster Cam feature that allows players to ride the roller coasters. Roller-coaster Tycoon 3 also features new gameplay elements - including diversity of guests, added group behaviour and improved guest AI - and many other new features which build upon the fun and addictive nature of the original game. View your park from any angle, get up close to guests and customise every detail of your booming, thrill-a-minute theme park. 
 
Roller-coaster Tycoon - Wild Expansion Pack: Rollercoaster Tycoon 3: Wild is an incredible expansion pack that brings the majesty of Nature to your amusement park. Now you can do more than just add water parks, you can create an incredible circus filled with animal attractions. Build animal enclosures, cages, and attractions like a choreographed lion tamer show set in an arena. The little ones can ride on elephants, and the whole family can ride an SUV on a guided rail. Two radical new coaster types - One that has two cars rolling side-by-side then splitting off, another with cars hanging from a robot arm. This game is much more than an expansion with more coasters, new characters and gameplay additions that extend the Roller-coaster Tycoon experience. Dozens of new adrenalin pumping attractions and breath-taking rides will make fans roar with delight-it's an all-new spin on this popular franchise. 
 
Roller-coaster Tycoon - Soaked Expansion Pack

The fate of embattled Missouri was crucial to the war efforts of both sides and Campaign Ozark depicts these decisive conflicts in three campaigns.

description:
The High Priestess, symbol of the Goddess herself in the Confined Valley, has died, and the tribes must find her successor. Each of them must send a Candidate, a pure woman who just became of age, who will have to show talent for the arts of magic, combat, and love... And manages to get the others to accept her leadership. 
 
A text-based, erotic game combining elements from Dating Sims, RPGs, Choose Your Own Adventure Novels and Simulation based games, that puts its focus on creating an environment that pushes its characters to engage in rich, dynamic behavior to make them feel as alive as possible, evolving to the events developing around them - and shaping the world and others to fit their own goals and visions.

name: New Era
description: Have you not ever dreamed of your own empire, your own city? New Era is a survival strategy game, where your goals are to overcome natural death causes such as hunger, thirst, and cold. Build a fire to keep you warm, build a house for your villagers, kill animals for meat, protect yourself from other players/AI, and kill them for meat. Create alliances with other players and form a town. Do whatever it takes to survive. Protect your city at all costs!

name: Thang Online

It's an action-oriented game with featured leveling, Monster and Ki Transformation systems, player-crafted and enhanced armor, and more.

description: Launch Break is a fast-paced 4-player local party game, where you must fight over a single chance to escape a crash-imminent spaceship!Challenge your friends with all your arsenal, perks and the ability to shape the battleground to your advantage.

Sacrifices must me made!

name: BoomBang
description: BoomBang is a virtual world hangout where you can fight fly laugh and so much more

name: Mahjong Escape: Ancient China
description: Take a mahjong adventure all the way to ancient China! Match magic gold tiles as you unlock ancient Chinese wisdom and collect lost treasures. It's a relaxing journey through time! Travel through 11 dynasties as you master over 175 unique levels. Enjoy stunning hand-painted backgrounds and earn special power-up tiles that help you along the way. Play through Dynasty Adventure or just relax with Classic Mahjong solitaire. Either way, you'll be mesmerized by the scenery: you've never seen mahjong like this. Escape to ancient China today!

name: Dogma
description:
Dogma is a Japanese fighting game that suffers a bit for being not completely finished. For some reason, the development stopped, so we have only a single background, a single BG music (though it's quite a good one), no endings (not even some credits rolling), practically not configurable keyboard controls (you can only change functions between the predefined keys) and no difficulty levels - the only way to get an easier challenge is reducing the other player's energy in the options screen. There should even be a secret character named Sayuri, but... There are no files related to her...

The rest, however, makes up greatly for these lacks. The nine characters are well-done in every aspect: good characterization (and don't forget their portraits in the selection and VS screen: beautiful), great and fluid animations, many special moves with a lot of spectacular graphic effects. Each one is available in eight different color palettes, and there's even a secret menu in the options to edit them! The most powerful moves require the pressure of two attack keys together, and for this reason there are four shortcut keys too. I had many problems with the standard layout, which forces the player to use the left hand to move, until I found out that the "Dolphin-Mode" option enables another keyboard layout (see the reference card). There are no more shortcut keys for easier super moves this way, but it isn't a big deal since the keystrokes detection is always flawless - in fact, I hardly ever used the shortcuts even in normal mode :) Fast, fun gameplay and combative AI ensure a good challenge for a game that, if brought to 100% completion, would rival many commercial productions in quality. If you like fighting games, however, don't miss it in any case.

name: Perfectly Perilous Provisions
description:
Think Human: Fall Flat wobbles into Overcooked and serves up a side of Takeshi's Castle in a Victorian town beset by eldritch beings!

Perfectly Perilous Provisions is a co-op active rag doll culinary adventure. Flop and flail your way through bizarre dishes and devices to serve up to all manner of customer!

Take part in frantic mini-games and obstacle courses to unlock new ingredients and character customisations.

name: Inspector Javert and the Oath of Blood
description:
Inspector Javert and the Oath of Blood is an adventure mystery game set in Paris, 1832, beginning the morning after the barricades fell on the famed June Rebellion.

​Inspired by Victor Hugo's literary classic Les Miserables and real historical events, Inspector Javert and the Oath of Blood deviates from the novel at the point where the eponymous Inspector jumps into the river Seine. Instead of meeting his fate in the murky waters Javert survives and grows to discover a new lease on life.

Play as Inspector Javert as you delve into cases, solve crimes, fight alongside your allies, and discover what it means to be alive.

name: Tetr.io
description: Tetr.io is a modern yet familiar online stacker developed by osk. Play against friends and foes all over the world, or claim a spot on the leaderboards - the stacker future is yours!

name: A Broken Tale
description:
A Broken Tale is a commercial game made by a small Norwegian indie studio(NoLoot studios. It is inspired by 90's classics like South Park, Zelda a Link to the past, Banjo & Kazooie and Conker Bad fur day. It's a original game with custom art, music and graphics. It used to be a RPG Maker project but we decided to make in an official indie title in a stronger game engine instead. The game is a musical comedy action lite rpg adventure game. It's 2D-top down like Zelda for SNES. The graphic and animations are inspired by Southpark (animations), Conker and Banjo & Kazooie.

The game takes off where most games end. The big villain has been defeated, the hero have won. But the "The End" screen has not yet blocked the heavens, so you as one of the bad guys are searching for a new villain. The game breaks the fourth wall heavily and all of the characters are aware that they are video game characters.

It's open a open world you first travel trough throughout the main story, but you can always backtrack for side-quests and exploration.

We have no official release date, but the game is very much still in development. It has been for soon to be five years now.

Here is a little teaser trailer from when we updated the game engine ->

name: Lost Relics
description:
Lost Relics is an Action-Adventure Role Playing Game with blockchain backed items that you can truly own.

Explore Talmuth and embark on Adventures in search of precious artifacts while saving the townsfolk from terrifying beasts!

Precious Artifacts you find are Matrixchain Digital Collectibles which are tangible game assets with real value, allowing you to trade, sell or own forever!

name: Steam Chain
description: Like Super Meat Boy, but you play as a wanna-be engineer! Face perilous hardships and solve mind-bending puzzles, all with the end goal of freeing the city of Chrono Steel. Explore a unique steampunk world while collecting and solving puzzles with gears. Explore you movement arsenal that includes creating platforms and spinning on crazy cogwheels!

name: Kobold Adventure
description: Kobold Adventure is an adult, text-based choose your own adventure game. You will assume the role of a kobold, and try to survive in a hostile medieval fantasy world. You will face many trials and tribulations before the end, and your life will not be an easy one. Can you make it out alive, or will you fall prey to the many dangers of this world?

name: Who is the Hero?: Lycoris
description: A three-day story about a girl named Rico who lives in a village and is a mysterious fairy.

name: Unneglectable
description:

You may face the agenda again in this mysterious world. 
A player have a adventure with the little shadow in the mysterious world. 
Open a road with a power to grab the essence of something. In this adventure, you may know what happened there in the past and who he is.

1. Get all coins in the level 
2. Tap two cubic cursors to swap

Enjoy the Swapon!

They harvest or multiply the tentacles growing on the lake and aim to complete the picture book. Hand the tentacles to the owner, get alcohol and collect stories.
Let's try to complete the tentacles and the story in a maddening asian gothic world!

name: Shaolin5
description:
Five shaolin monks survived the burning of their temple.They now set on the path of revenge, and begin a special training as deadly and evil as Hell itself!”Enjoy a cool and easy to play free-fight experience.

The core strategy of the game lies in a wise use of attack, guard, an evasion moves to dismay your foes without a scratch! Look closely at your enemies’ moves and unleash powerful combos! You can also play with your friends if you have more than one controller connected!

name: Retro Game Aliens
description: A late-night adventure for the 8-bit PC generation. - Retro Game Aliens is packed with nostalgia and love for the text-based genre of adventure games that shaped the evolution of RPGs and visual novels before fading into obscurity.

name: LightDread City
description:
"Lightdread City" is a turn-based puzzle-solving game. In this world, Light was forbidden. But because of the met with the Secret Knower, You, Carina, began the journey of truth hunting by using a significant roulette to unmask the secret of light.

The game features a table-top-like input system that requires player to drag and drop the chess, which is the representation of the player, with their mouse or touch panel and spin the ring shaped floor panel in order to simulate the feeling that they are playing on a real table-top game and get a better user experience. We plan to publish the game on both personal computer and mobile platforms in the hope of bringing the experience to more players.

name: HotCake!
description:
~This game is a hot cake-making game that destroys the food tower~ 
 
　Players control their fists and hit the handle of the frying pan.Then the pancake pops out of the frying pan.At this time, the angle at which the hotcake is served changes depending on the speed and angle of the fist.Then destroy the pancake by hitting the food tower. 
 
　Also, there are hidden events in the background of the game, and the official team is implemented from the configuration, so it's a game that makes you laugh after touching various things.

name: Glimmer
description: Glimmer is a platform game tells the story that a spirit from the dark and deep sea world was called by the light and leaving the deep sea to pursue the light and finding himself.

name: Gardeniampoule
description: Gardeniampoule is a "Dungeon-Farming Rougelike game" where you can enjoy cultivation and item collection.

name: Diorama Knight
description: Welcome to dungeon in the basement of a board game board! This is a new type of battle game set in a cute diorama world. Control your knight to beat your rivals to the boss before they do! Set in the world of cute dioramas, this game has a new sense of nostalgia and depth! Based on strategy board games familiar since childhood, players compete for underground treasure. In addition to online matches, playing with close friends such as parents and children or couples every day will make the game progress. You don't have to be scared to hear it's a strategy game. Why don't you start a new hobby with your close friends?

name: Binary Fighter
description:
We will make the "stickman battle animation" that was once popular in Japan into an action game! 
Although it is a trial version that is still under development, I think that you can enjoy the feeling of moving that animation with your own hands.

name: Clonk Extreme
description:
Clonk Extreme is a 3D online multiplayer game set in the world of the Clonk series. 
 
The game features fast paced tactical team battles and deathmatches in various scenarios.

name: Haunted Garage
description: Haunted Garage is a a multi-headed adventure game set in a semi-meta virtual space. Start with exploring a strange little pixel world while building up your inventory with magical objects, instruments and devices. Embark on a further musical journey and start crafting your own unique and evolving soundtrack to the whole experience. ~ Anything goes ~

name: Touhou Fan Game Jam Black Lives Matter Collection
description: This is a sizable collection of Touhou fangames created for the Touhou game jams. Our jam community has no tolerance for racism and strives to live in a Touhou fan community without it, so many of our creators have donated their jam entries here to be submitted to itch.io's Bundle for Racial Justice and Equality. Included as well is new content for NitorInc.: Touhou Microgames! DEMO+.

name: Student Union
description:
Lane is in trouble and needs work, ASAP. At the kick-off of his final year of high school, he turns to asking the faculty for help. The assistant principal Mr. Underwood recommends a unique solution: form and lead a student organization dedicated to the support and maintenance of the institution. However, Lane must convince at least four other students to join the group before the end of the week.

Underneath this pretext he quickly learns the school administration is more sinister than it seems, that great danger lies within the school walls, and that the group he’s forming may be more necessary than he realized.

Your choices guide Lane through this dark drama and romance as shifting pressures form, strain, and shatter strong bonds. Found a student government, recruit members, and struggle to maintain them in the face of unexpected challenges and danger.

name: Soundpatch
description:
Soundpatch is a simple, casual, puzzle game with rope-physics where you connect buttons together using a limited length of a string. The music adapts depending on how much progress the player has made in a level. 
 
--- 
 
This game was a part of RISING SEA 2020 - A collaboration between game creators in South East Asia where game ideas come from unorthodox mediums encouraging creative freedom and experimentation.

name: Springtale
description:
You've slept for so long during the winter, sadly just you woke up at the end of the winter and all your friends are still as sleep. The thaw brings unexpected experiences, help your friends to feel as good as you in this new season! 
 
 
This game is made using Unreal Engine 4 during the 2020 Unreal Spring Jam. 
 
 
Every single asset in this game was made during the Jam by a single developer, me, Francisco Fuhro and the development was streamed on twitch. There was around 70 hours of work put on this game, no crunches, no late or early morning bed. It was an awesome experience! Surprisingly, the game is also under 100mb of download! Play the game and enjoy!

name: Robo Meltdown
description: Robo Meltdown is a story about a robot tasked with saving his creators. Many years ago they were trapped under a form of snow. They had seen this coming and had prepared counter measures but they were too late!

name: What Happens at S.C.A.R
description: S.C.A.R (Space Center for Alien Research) is where Lt. Karlson is posted. Faced with a suspicious system failure and mutant outbreak, which doesn't necessarily seem as it looks to be like.

name: Mt. Apricot
description:
"Mt. Apricot is facing its greatest challenge yet! 
 
As mysterious goo is taking hold of the entire floating archipelago, it's up to our hero, Blueberry, to cleanse his home from the hazardous corruption" 
 
Credits 
 
  Design & Production 
  Maud Bakker 
  Roel Jansen 
  Beyza Öpöz 
 
  Programmers 
  Diana Calistru 
  Tristan Poiesz 
 
  Visual Artists 
  Charlot Hagenaars 
  Hanne Hammarstrøm 
  Lyubomira Petrova 
  Isa Weijers 
 
  Audio design 
  Jordi van der Hulst 
 
First-year student project. 
International Game Architecture and Design at Breda University of Applied Sciences.

name: Cyber War: Fight to the Last Man
description: CyberWar is a multiplayer online game, playable on PC. The focus is on player vs. player gameplay with each player piloting a battle hovercraft. The objective is to destroy enemy troops and complete the mission either by destroying all vessels of the opposing team or capturing the enemy team's base. The player takes control of a single hovercraft of his choice, and enters the battle on a random map. The player has control over the hover's movement, firing, and can communicate with allied players via the text chat. The goal is to survive and save the human race from extinction by breaching into the heart of the enemy's defense, while contending with traps, drones, robots.

name: Project Starline
description:
Project Starline is a multiplayer sci-fi arcade racer, set in the 24th century where a sport called Rigout is at its highest point, being the most popular sport in the known universe. 
 
In Project Starline, you control a mechanized suit called a Rig that has special abilities which are unlocked during racing by flying through specifically marked spots. You can use those abilities to influence the race in different ways.

name: Password
description: During a secluded mansion vacation, Dave and his friends are offered the contents of a mysterious password-locked vault if they are able to find the Zodiac medals hidden throughout the estate. Each friend, however, holds secrets from their past that threaten to bring the trip—and each other's lives—to a tragic end in this mystery/thriller visual novel.

name: Twisted Metal: Black Harbor City
description:
Twisted Metal: Black was to have a sequel titled Twisted Metal: Black - Harbor City, though it was never officially announced and the project was later scrapped.

Details on the game were revealed in the PlayStation 2 port of Twisted Metal: Head-On, Twisted Metal Head-On: Extra Twisted Edition. It was originally planned the levels of Harbor City to be greatly expanded and inter-connected with one another, giving a greater feeling of a single, complete world rather than stand-alone levels.

The four completed levels were included in the game as a bonus feature entitled Twisted Metal: Lost.

name: VGA Planets
description:
VGA Planets is a multi-player, space strategy war game originally released in 1992. The game simulates combat in space between galactic scale empires. It follows the 4X game (eXplore, eXpand, eXploit & eXterminate) model: The players start with a homeworld, and have to build spaceships, explore the galaxy, colonize planets, mine minerals, build up their industry. 
 
The game is set in the "Echo Cluster" where 11 different races fight for control. It was one of the first indie games to become commercially successful. It was notable for being played via email, without a central server: each game of up to 11 players is handled independently, with the players sending their orders for each turn to the computer which manages that game. 
 
A hosted web version is now available.

name: Impetus: Clamor in Portis
description:
Impetus is a tactical game inspired by the events that took place after the Fall of the Roman Empire (4th-5th century AD), in which the player takes command of a legion that survived the last battle and tries to defeat any other possible legion they may encounter.

Each player (PvP) will command the units that the legion is composed of, each of which has its own characteristics.

name: Fishing Clash 2020: Fish Catching Games
description:
Millions of anglers already played Fishing Clash! Join them!
The most popular hobby now in your pocket! Start catching fish species in Fishing Clash - free fishing simulator and new 3D game from Ten Square Games, the producer of Let's Fish app. High time to go fishing!

name: Blood and Ruby
description: On the edge of unearthing a centuries-old secret, Marcus Sinclair was abducted. As his sister Ruby, it is quickly revealed to you, that the darkest of creatures wait at every turn! Face your destiny as you decipher the clues set forth by your ancestors. Bring peace to a world on the edge of an evil destruction in Blood and Ruby, a fantastic Hidden Object Adventure game!

name: World Mosaics IV
description: The Atlantis World Museum has risen from the depths of the ocean. However, all the exhibits have been completely destroyed! Travel back in time and solve pictographic Puzzles to restore the lost artifacts. Journey from the Pharaoh’s Tomb, to the Silk Road, to Stonehenge andother exciting locales as you restore the Atlantis World Museum in World Mosaics 4!

name: World Mosaics 3: Fairy Tales
description: After restoring Atlantis, you discover a magical book that sends you on a journey through literature in World Mosaics 3 – Fairy Tales! Solve pictographic puzzles on your way through the stories of the Frog Prince, Babe the Blue Ox, Sleeping Beauty, and other classics as you restore the magical book and return home in this fun and exciting Puzzle game! Dive into your favorite Fairy Tales and return home!

name: World Mosaics 2
description: Return to the puzzle adventure that takes you around the world! Having tracked the origins of the Sea People to the legendary city of Atlantis, the power of a magical hourglass has taken you back through time in World Mosaics 2! Solve your way through the Puzzles of the Jurassic period, through the Dawn of Civilization, to the glorious Renaissance, as you restore the hourglass of the Pelasgians and return to your own time!

name: World Mosaics
description: Dr. Remington has unearthed a relic of the mysterious Pelasgians. To truly discover and unravel the mystery of an ancient civilization, you must travel to the city of the majestic Parthenon, Greece! Work your way through seven exotic locations in Story mode or tackle over 100 puzzles in an extra puzzle mode. Safeguard the history of World Mosaics in this globe-trotting Adventure.

name: Kajko i Kokosz: Twierdza Czarnoksiężnika
description: Kajko i Kokosz: Twierdza Czarnoksiężnika is a typical point'n'click adventure game, where the player's task is to find hidden objects and combine them to solve puzzles.

name: Open Tournament
description: Open Tournament is a futuristic first person shooter where players master innovative weapons and dynamic movement to prove they are the best. Open Tournament is an open-source project currently in development by a community of veteran developers & Unreal Tournament fans.

name: Super Mario Bros. & The Midas Machine
description:
Formerly known as Mushroom Patrol: Midas Machine, this is the final demo for one of the biggest and most anticipated Mario fangame projects of all time.

100% original graphics and even music composed by the best of MFGG, original ideas and tons of content await you.

Join Mario, Luigi, Wario and Waluigi, each with their unique abilities, in a grand adventure to defeat their teamed up arch nemesis..es(?), King Bowser and Captain Syrup.

name: Power Star Frenzy
description: Power Star Frenzy is an unofficial fan game with the Mario characters and aesthetics. It was cancelled, having its final demo in 2019 (v0.2.4 SUPERNOVA DEMO), with 45 stars in total to collect and multiplayer co-op and battle mode.

name: Desastre Colectivo
description: Este es un viejo proyecto de una jam con temática de educación, el juego termino siendo menos educativo de lo que esperábamos, pero también mas divertido así que termino bien, se trata de la horrible tarea de ser una profesora y tratar de mantener a un grupo de niños en orden durante una excursión.

name: The Morrison Survival Game
description: You are in the dark in the mountains, battling your fears of the darkness and battle for Survival. Can you get over your fear of the dark and survive the night? Be Careful of two unknown individuals who are chasing you for stealing their cookies and invading their privacy.

name: Lacrymo Tennis 2016
description: No one does bourgeois revolution quite like the French.

name: The Spark of One
description: A game for Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.

name: Tales from the Road
description: A SFW furry interactive fiction game

name: Some Like It Hot: Chapter 0
description:
You just started as the newest barista of The Java Joint, a quaint café, run by the ever peppy Terra U, that would love to offer nothing more than a quiet corner for anyone in need of a hot drink and a seat. Though it’s a lot to juggle learning your new job, with its complex caffeinated concoctions, and new relationships with the cafe’s regulars, the Java Joint start to feel like a more than just a source of caffeine. However, when Terra gets an offer from a longtime friend that could jeopardizes the cafe, the bitter taste of reality puts your new life on the line. 
 
Your decisions on and off the job will be what determine the future of the coffee shop. Some Like It Hot! Will you find Brew Love?

name: BulletHell Planes
description: Shoot your way through the enemy lines in hyperpowered aircraft!!!

name: The Old Man
description: The Old Man game puts you in the shoes of a homeless person trying to find a place to hide during rain, but he will find so much more than just a roof over his head.

name: Make your Adventure
description:
"Make your adventure" will allow you, even without programing skills, to make your narrative video game in a few minutes. Just Make, Share & Play! 
 
Take your story, select your characters, write the dialogues, link everything and save it. From that moment you can share with your friends, students or customers a video game that tells your story.

name: Emuurom
description:
Emuurom ("eh-moo rom") is an upcoming nonviolent creature-scanning metroidvania.

You are Maire ("my-rhe"), a red-haired retrobiologist willingly trapped in an unknown world, inhabited by mostly peaceful creatures called Emuurom. You are only equipped with a data-gathering skanner' Beam that you can use to explore the ecosystem. Instead of powering up, you have to comprehend the creatures - and use their special abilities to advance!

Open up new paths, meet cute creatures, and sleep under the starry sky... but beware: on the horizon, a comet called The Red Interloper is inching closer, threatening the peaceful world. Overcome the obstacles and master the mysteries, and you might be able to save the species - and yourself.

name: Greg the Clumsy Ghost
description: A small puzzle-like lawn mowing adventure

name: The Hero of Budgie Island
description:
The world of Budgie Island has fallen to shambles when the evil Dr Angery makes his big debut, taking over the unsuspecting island and causing havoc. Take control of the Hero, as he sprints, bounces, and swings his way through his adventure to save Budgie Island.

Based on the comic style and storytelling of a young child, the Hero of Budgie Island is a simple but fun adventure game with a wild cast of characters, collectible items, and a very mean dentist I mean, mad scientist.

name: Super Mario Bros. Dimensions 2
description:
Super Mario Bros. Dimensions 2 is a fan game and the upcoming sequel to Super Mario Bros. Dimensions. Taking place after the end of the first game, the Mushroom Kingdom is intruded upon by the dangerous EVL Army, who steal the powerful ring that Bowser had used in the last game. Mario, Luigi and Polter are joined by an ex-EVL soldier named Eden to take back Princess Peach and the ring!

There will be many levels with different missions to complete by finding Energy Drops. The game also aims at making Polter more involved, with him now being able to consume special fruits to give him powers to help Mario out. Power-ups such as Laser and Jetpack return, while the new Thorn power-up joins them, with other new power-ups still to come.

name: Sushi Master VR
description: Sushi Master VR is a Sushi making game. You can experience basic operations of a conveyor belt sushi restaurant.

name: Krampusnacht
description:
Krampusnacht is an 8-bit tile-based Christmas horror game. 
 
⏰ Lasts 20 to 30 minutes! 
 
It's the night of December 5th. Tomorrow is the Feast of St. Nicholas, when children are given all sorts of gifts... if they make it through the night. 
 
If you've been naughty, you will meet your doom at the hands of Krampus, an ancient demon who punishes evildoers once every year.

name: Mend Game
description: Mend is a game about curing a traumatizing experience. Sometimes you need to replay the level as the pieces get stuck. Like your feelings in real life.

name: Jonas Sky Scraper
description: Jonas Sky Scraper made for Game Jam Wowie 2.

name: Arriving Home
description:
Made in 36 hours during Quarantine Jam. 
 
Playtime 5-10 min. 
 
Features: 
 
  cool art 
  choices (not much tho) 
  weirdness 
  a girl who likes to dream

name: Ecoman
description: Ecoman is a short game created during Eco Jam held in Museum of Contemporary Art Garage during 23-24 November.

name: Core Stratagem
description: Core Stratagem is an old-school turn-based indie strategy game. Choose one of eight unique factions and conquer your enemies, using terrain to your advantage and capturing your opponents' cities. Steal and finish their incomplete units to turn their production against them. Make use of stealth to launch surprise attacks, and when all else fails, detonate a kamikaze unit in the midst of their armies.

name: Rain of Flames
description: Rain of Flames is an endless runner platformer. Which means the fun never ends (this can be a good thing and a bad thing). Rain of Flames is a game about a little dude name Larry and he has to escape the end of the world by running and dodging falling planets that are falling down. There are many options for the game such as an Easy mode a Normal mode and a Hard mode. Since every game needs a hard mode. Rain of Flames is available now on Windows/Macs/Android and Linux. Consume our product please.

name: Fairy Penguin Parade
description:
The fairy penguin (also known as the little penguin) is the world's smallest penguin. 
 
Every night, in many places along the coast of Southern Australia, penguin colonies return en masse from their daily hunting expeditions, under the cover of dusk, to their onshore burrows. 
 
On Phillip Island, this is known as the "penguin parade." 
 
Guide a penguin home to its burrow as night sets in.

name: My Last Friend
description:
After an alien invasion that almost wiped out all of humanity, you take shelter in an old abandoned bunker along with your dog, Murphy. Years after the invasion with no contact, believing you may actually be the last man on Earth, you hear a voice over the radio. 
 
My Last Friend is a short point and click adventure game with elements of Horror.

name: BlueBoi Remastered
description: A remake of the 2D classic-looking 2019 platformer titled BlueBoi with new levels, mechanics and modes.

name: Strangle/Hold
description: Strangle/Hold is a wave-based top-down shooter where a small biomachine named "Hemo Hemo" is sent to eliminate a plague before it spreads. Using a grappling hook that allows him to steal unique weapons from his enemies, it's up to Hemo Hemo to save humanity.

name: The Red Door
description: The Red Door is a short horror game where you play as an abduction victim placed in the house of a murderer. Find your way around the house and escape before the murderer catches you. The murderer loves to play with his victims so he will give you three chances to escape. Find the keys to unlock the doors, Read the notes left from his past victims and escape as fast as you can.

name: Clouds of Fire: Blazing Skies
description: Complete Chaos in this Shoot-em up meets Rouge-like with Physics!

name: The Dark by Eric Koziol
description: Trust your ears. Along with your wits they're all you have as you make your way through the labyrinth to defeat the evil that lurks within.

name: The Heart's Illumination
description: The Heart's Illumination is a short romance/puzzle RPG made for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 4!

name: The Grimoire of Alice
description: A short game about a little girl who wants to escape from her family.

name: The Egg of Basan
description:
Something stirs in the early morning...

An ethereal crowing is heard...

It's a really big chicken that wants its egg back, but is just too afraid to do anything by itself. It's up to Kutaka to save the day, dashing, fluttering, and PUNCHING her way through obstacles and rival myth-birds!

name: Scarlet Midnight
description: Made in 3 days for Touhou Game Jam 5. A spiritual prequel to the events in EOSD, following the rakugo performer Kono.

name: Mochi Making Mischief
description: Tewi has divised a plan to make mochi on the moon and sell it to the inhabitants of Gensokyo for New Year... But of course Reisen will be the one on the spotlight. With Seiran's mochi hammering skills they will (attempt to) make the best mochi the universe has ever seen. If the mochi's not good though, Reisen will have to take responsability for this.

name: Memoir of Phantom's Fortitude
description: After her mentor's disappearance, Youmu is left to uncover information about his past and the Youkai Cherry Tree, Saigyou Ayakashi.

name: Mimi-Chan's Ballistic Adventure
description:
Useful control stuff that we didn't get a lot of time to explain: 
You control Mimi-Chan with your mouse even after firing 
Hold the left mouse to focus Mimi-Chan and move slowly. 
The faster Mimi-Chan is, the bigger they go boom, but they harder they are to steer.. 
Use the scroll wheel to zoom in and out to get a better view.

name: Lovely Fairy Action
description:
Made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 4 (the Pride Month one!). 
 
A short ~5 minute shooty game. The danmaku is quite light by Touhou standards, so newcomers should be fine here.

name: Little Ideology
description: Touhou fangame. Help Flippy and Tiny go on a gay adventure!

name: Inabatron
description:
janky robotron: 2084 homage made from scratch by one idiot in under 46 hours for touhou fan game jam 5 (theme: "folklore, myth, legend") 
 
help tewi fight against wave after wave of dangerous yokai from the legend of the hare of inaba. collect all the rabbits on the screen to advance waves. shoot or avoid the yokai and their attacks -- and don't let them get to the rabbits first. there are no bombs or power-ups, but you'll get an extra life every 60,000 points.

name: Green 9 Deal
description: It's Cirno saving the planet in classic "P v E"!

name: Gensokyo Ninja Warrior
description: Gensokyo Ninja Warrior is a game with Touhou-style flight controls, but platforming-style objectives. Each level is made up of a series of courses, and the rules are simple: Reach the goal and don't get shot.

name: Frozen dirt
description: Another god damn repetitive bug-filled short bullet hell with poor balancing made under extreme pressure by trevor boddy very slowly over about a week for cirno game jam sept. 2019 with the aid of: 12oz coffee grounds / ~50 beers etc etc

name: Formidable Alice
description: Marisa's a smooth talker, but can she smooth-talk her way into Alice's heart?

name: Flight of the Baby Princess
description: A modernized and revolutionary retelling of a folklore classic.

name: Eternal Memory for a Poltergeist
description: This game is originally made in less than 72 Hours for Touhou Fan Game Jam.

name: Stagehands!
description: Let’s get the show on the road! Set up the stage with your friends and face pure chaos in this 2-4 player co-op, guaranteed to make you break a leg. As a team, prepare to improvise in the face of sabotage and environmental mayhem. The fate of the play is in your paws!

name: Red Sails
description: Explore the desert aboard your sailboat, rescue stranded people on your way, bring them home, while looking for other members of your waning clan: the Red Sails.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 Collector’s Edition
description:
The collector's edition of Vampire: The Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 includes:
- The Game
- Steelbook case
- 3 digital DLC packs
- Map of Seattle
- 7-inch vinyl soudntrack
- 5th Edition Vampire the Masquerade Core Book PDF
- 28cm statue of Elif

name: Gravity Typist
description: Every key you press gets added to the pile, making your screen unusable.

name: Vincent: The Secret of Myers
description:
Five years have passed since the infamous G4 Cyborg Incident plagued Myers Corporation. With the corporation now being bankrupted, the once busy G4 district is slowly decaying. You awake inside a mysterious mansion with only a Myers employee card in your pocket. Who are you? How did you end up here? And what does Myers Corporation have to do with any of it?

Investigate Myers Corporation and dig up dark truths that were probably better left forgotten. Solve puzzles, explore, and survive as you learn about the dark secrets held inside the decommissioned facility. Will you be clever enough to make sense out of your situation, or will you disappear just like the rest?

name: War of Ants
description: War of Ants is a real-time PVP strategy mobile game where you compete with players around the world. Collect crypto-backed units, rare artifacts and wage war against other ant colonies.

name: Dwerg Saga
description: Guide your Dwerg clan in their glorious saga

name: Patches of Adventure
description: The mayor has declared it's the start of the harvest season festival! To kick it off, he's begun a seed collecting competition! You know just where to find 4 unique seeds that'll win you the contest! Armed with only your knowledge and shovel, you strike out early in the day to begin your quest! Cause you know the more seeds you get, the more powerful you'll become!

name: Woter-a tale of two water cans
Mariovania
description:
Castlevania appeared in Mushroom Kingdom. Help Mario explore the castle and stop whoever is behind this.

Features:
-mix of Castlevania and Mario
-huge, exploreable world with map
-experience and equipment system, along with magic skills to upgrade
-enemy encyclopedia
-several abilities you need for Mario to reach new areas
-100+ old and new enemies
-great soundtrack
-many secrets
-runs on Windows, Linux and Mac!

name: PQ93
description: A fantasy console for making small games

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter II - Broken Wings
description: Fight for justice in Chapter II of this anime-themed graphic adventure game! Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Chapter II - Broken Wings is the the second release in the episodic NALE series. This has now been delisted for anyone who doesn't already own it; the content of this game was rolled into the collected release "Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One".

name: Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle
description: Fight for justice in Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, an anime-themed graphic adventure game! This was the original chapter release of Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, which has now been superceded in the collected release, Nina Aquila: Legal Eagle, Season One.

name: No-brainer! Heroes
description: "No-brainer! Heroes" is an semi-idle game suitable for fishing at work, covers leisure and strategy. It inherits many of the game features loved by the previous players, and adds new gameplay and elements in battle, skills, levels, and town management.

name: Pragmata
description: Pragmata is an action adventure title that depicts a near-future dystopian world on the moon through a deeply profound story and setting. The game will take full advantage of next-generation platform features, and as Capcom's first completely new IP made for dedicated video game consoles in four years†, the company aims to establish Pragmata as one of its core brands.

name: Pathfinder: Kingmaker - Royal Ascension
description:
Two additional portraits.
Digital Art Book with sketches of characters, monsters, items and the game world.
Official soundtrack.
A digital module for board game adventures.
A digital high-resolution map of the Stolen Lands.
A red panda in-game pet.

name: Feral
description: Fer.al is an online playground of fantastic species of myth and legend. Bring your creature to life as you design, create, and play in this strange and beautiful universe.

name: Timeless Adventure: A Journey to Begin
description: Time stands still in this Point&Click-like fantasy adventure game. Venture as a ghostly wraith through an idle world, in search of answers for Death herself. The only help is your ability to possess living or once-living beings.

name: Eizoku
description:
Eizoku is a short experimental horror game. 
 
Eizoku is currently in beta. Due to personal matters and lack of ideas I am putting work on Eizoku on indefinite hiatus. I may or may not return to it to flesh it out but I hope that many people can still enjoy it in it's current form. 
 
I've optimized the game as best as I can but unfortunately games that seem to have older or lower quality graphics cards have framerate issues. 
 
Donations are greatly appreciated as I have been unemployed for close to a year and need to keep myself afloat to keep doing what I love.

name: Danganronpa: Dead End
description:
16 students are trapped inside the illustrious Reservoir University and are told that they will stay there for the rest of their lives. The only way out? To kill another student and get away with it.

Danganronpa: Dead End is a non-profit visual novel based on the Danganronpa series by Kazutaka Kodaka and is not affiliated with Spike Chunsoft.

name: Paint My World
description:
A 2D platformer puzzle game with a fluffy paintball protagonist.

Our adventure takes part in a world full of Colour, or devoid of it depending on the situation! Our hero Fluff must take on the worlds challenges to save his family and restore order.

Each level requires a set number of objectives to be completed, such as painting a number of tiles, destroying certain enemies, saving so many babies, and of course fighting bosses.

Paint My World is designed to keep the game fresh and interesting throughout, this means that lots of new mechanics and items are added to the game in each world. It requires you to think on your feet and figure out the best way to use each item. Of course, we will hold your hand at the beginning – but before long you will be confident enough to take on the challenges yourself!

name: Mystiqa
description: A procedural open-world action-rpg with a heavy focus on interesting exploration and interactions, challenging combat and epic loot.

name: Darkland
description:
Darkland is a challenging platform game with one touch controller from indie developer. In this game, there is no moving buttons, no jumping button like others. Just touch to move and that is what you need to play. Be careful and prepare your finger. It is a quite hard platform game that you’ve never seen before. You might die many times before you complete the level. But don’t worry about the death, you won’t waste your time to wait a very boring game over scene. If you die, you can try again immediately so you can focus on your playing. 
 
You will meet Billy who is a white block. In some ways, he is lost into Darkland. That is a very dangerous place. He didn't know why but he needs to escape. He is not a ninja or a warrior but now he has to fight alone and find the way out. The only way to get out is the gate. Of course, there is no easy life, he has to avoid the spikes, or the light blocks if he doesn’t want to start again. It means the dark platforms are safe for him.

name: Coloristic
description:
Solve puzzles by dragging multiple paths on a grid. 
 
Colored blocks do only allow a specific path length which makes it much more challenging. Special blocks extends the game with different gameplay variations which makes it more tough and fun as you progress. 
 
The game contains 80 handmade challenges with increasing difficulty. 
 
You can also compare your rating with other people from around the world with integrated gamecenter support. 
 
Who will be the master of colors?

name: Chromatic: Color Puzzles
description: Chromatic: Color Puzzles is a colors-based puzzle game ideal for rest and relaxation. Tap colors to swap them until harmony is restored. You will find puzzles with the perfect hues and level of challenge for you. Express your artistic side by organizing colors into satisfyingly beautiful arrangements. Explore the endless number of multidimensional gradients that can be stretched across your screen. Get lost in captivating colors and ambient music.

name: Killer Auto
description: A futuristic racing game being developed by Ethan Redd, featuring new music from 2 Mello, Christa Lee, SKYBRIDGE, and Skylar Spence.

name: Chook & Sosig: A Case of Murder
description:
Something terrible has happened in The Neighbourhood!
A resident has been murdered and no-one is owning up to it.

With help a few hours away on the mainland, Chook and Sosig use that time to investigate crime scenes, talk to their neighbours and snoop for evidence.

Only a demo was released.
